title: Senate Panel Backs Bill To Allow Congressional Review Of Iran Deal
teaser: The Senate Foreign Relations Committee is expected to vote Tuesday on a bill that would give Congress a role in approving the Iran nuclear agreement.
contentencoded:
The Senate Foreign Relations Committee unanimously voted Tuesday in support of a bill that would give Congress a role in approving the Iran nuclear agreement.
